method: In a mixing bowl, combine the rainbow sprinkles and unicorn tears.
Using the circular saw, carefully slice the unicorn horns into thin twists.
In a separate bowl, mix the galaxy ice cream with the stardust.
Slowly fold in the sliced unicorn twists into the ice cream mixture.
Transfer the mixture into individual serving bowls.
Sprinkle extra rainbow sprinkles and stardust on top for decoration.
Serve immediately and enjoy the magical surprise!
